DOC.brief_summary: This study will follow ,morbidly obese subjects as they undertake weight loss before and after laparoscopic gastric banding, examining markers of glucose and lipid metabolism, adipokines and measures of body fat.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Medical and Surgical Weight Loss on Metabolism
DOC.criteria: morbidly obese subjects with type 2 diabetes or metabolic syndrome age <70 contraindications to bariatric surgery
